overview: Made in 2012, this multi-part film is so extreme that it was for some time regarded as an urban legend. It features the torture and rape of three girls by Australian sex trafficker and pederast Peter Scully and two Filipina women. Urged on by Scully, some of the most severe physical abuse was carried out on the children by one of his girlfriends, then 19-year-old Liezyl Margallo, who was formerly trafficked as a child.
title: Daisy's Destruction
